title: 'Cheap Speech' and SCOTUS on Speech
itunes:title: 'Cheap Speech' and SCOTUS on Speech
description:
Richard Hasen, a Professor of Law and Political Science at the University of California, Irvine, discusses his book, "Cheap Speech: How Disinformation Poisons Our Politics and How to Cure It."


Timothy Zick, a Professor of Law at William & Mary Law School, discusses the Supreme Court ruling that Boston violated the Constitution by refusing to fly a Christian civic group’s flag at city hall while raising the banners of other organizations.


June Grasso hosts. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
